ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 59. Southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

space_weather:
Space Weather Message Code: WARK06
Serial Number: 468
Issue Time: 2022 Dec 07 1325 UTC

WARNING: Geomagnetic K-Index of 6 expected
Valid From: 2022 Dec 07 1325 UTC
Valid To: 2022 Dec 07 1800 UTC
Warning Condition: Onset
NOAA Scale: G2 - Moderate

NOAA Space Weather Scale descriptions can be found at
www.swpc.noaa.gov/noaa-scales-explanation

Potential Impacts: Area of impact primarily poleward of 55 degrees Geomagnetic Latitude.
Induced Currents - Power grid fluctuations can occur. High-latitude power systems may experience voltage alarms.
Spacecraft - Satellite orientation irregularities may occur; increased drag on low Earth-orbit satellites is possible.
Radio - HF (high frequency) radio propagation can fade at higher latitudes.
Aurora - Aurora may be seen as low as New York to Wisconsin to Washington state.

state.message: Sorry we're currently closed but we will be open next Sunday from 12 - 5PM and Monday from 7 - 10PM. Check us out on Facebook.
state.preMessage: In memory of Nicholas Lordi, who passed away on Nov 4th. Nick was a supporter of the Information Age Learning Center (InfoAge) and and the IXR/CDL makerspace. His family asks that if you are so moved, you make a donation to support the expanded Makerspace program at InfoAge..
state.postMessage: To get current updates subscribe to our CDL Mail list or cdl+subscribe@groups.io.
state.blogUpdate: (Title: Makerspace near me ... Can't find CDL - Updated: Oct. 05, 2022)
